attributes.action: Dissolve Parliment and Call a General Election with Immediate Effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call upon PM Gordon Brown to dissolve this parliment and call a general election with immediate effect, the current Labaour government is a shambles and they should be removed before any further damage to our nation is caused.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
